name: Election Town
storyline: Here, in Election Town, you’ve just inherited an old house that belonged to your grandparents. Our town was forgotten by the world. Time moves slowly in these parts, as we go from one election to another. Some of our fellow citizens have lost all hope that anyone other than the devious Mayor can even win.
summary: Election Town is a humorous small-town life simulator with a political twist. Build and decorate the house of your dreams, make decisions that will shape the city, and take your part in the election against the current Mayor. It’s Election time and your choices matter most!
